text: Stellar Airpark Great Circle Mapper: SLJ - Chandler, Arizona (Stellar Airpark) is a privately owned public-use residential airpark located west of the central business district of Chandler, a city in Maricopa County, Arizona, United States. It is privately owned by the Stellar Runway Utilizers Association, Inc (SRUA). All homeowners including aircraft owners who base at FBO tiedowns or FBO hangars are required to pay annual dues to the SRUA to maintain runway facilities. == Facilities and aircraft == Stellar Airpark covers an area of which contains one asphalt paved runway (17/35) measuring 3,913 x 60 ft (1,193 x 18 m). For the 12-month period ending July 31, 2005, the airport had 39,000 aircraft operations, an average of 106 per day, all of which were general aviation. There are 152 aircraft based at this airport: 88% single engine, 7% multi-engine, 3% jet aircraft, 2% helicopters and 1% ultralight. == References == == External links == * Stellar Runway Utilizers Association * Stellar Airpark (P19) at Arizona DOT airport directory * Category:Residential airparks Category:Airports in Maricopa County, Arizona
title: Stellar Airpark
